attributes.action: Roy Hodgson not to be Leicester city manager
attributes.additional_details: I believe Roy Hodgson is past it he makes shocking decisions proved that with England and we need someone with fresh ideas to take this club forward
attributes.background: I think I'm speaking on behalf of a near 100% of Leicester city fans that Roy Hodgson is definitely not the right man to take over from ranieri and would like every fan to get behind this petition to convince our owners to make the right decision
